short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The tool for selecting colors on your computer and on Web pages is a Google Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Google Chrome extension allows you to easily pick colors from web pages. With the color picker tool, you can select any color on a web page and copy its HEX or RGB codes. To use the color picker, simply click on the extension icon and hover the mouse over the desired color. The chosen color codes are instantly copied to your clipboard.
